ForecastingShare.name: ForecastingShare
ForecastingShare.description: Represents forecasts shared between a forecast manager and a user.

AccessLevel.description: Whether the user youâ€™re sharing your forecasts with can view and adjust the forecasts or view only. This field is new since the pilot. Picklist values: ViewAndEdit ViewOnly

SharedForecastManagerRoleId.description: The ID of either: The role of the manager whose forecasts you want to share. The territory whose forecasts you want to share.

RoleType.description: The type of hierarchy associated with the forecast share. R - Role-based T - Territory-based Y - Territory2-based

UserOrGroupId.description: The ID of the user with whom the forecast is shared.
